titleStmt.title: Severall Acts of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled, for the abolishing of Deanes, Deans and Chapters, Canons, Prebends, and other offices and titles, of or belonging to any cathedrall, or collegiate church or chappel within England and Wales Together with the severall ordinances and declarations of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the abolishing of Archbishops, and Bishops, within the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales.
Public General Acts. 1646-1649.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

titleStmt.title: Severall Acts of the Commons of England in Parliament assembled, for the abolishing of Deanes, Deans and Chapters, Canons, Prebends, and other offices and titles, of or belonging to any cathedrall, or collegiate church or chappel within England and Wales Together with the severall ordinances and declarations of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament, for the abolishing of Archbishops, and Bishops, within the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales.
Public General Acts. 1646-1649.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales.

notesStmt.note: "The severall ordinances and declarations of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: for the abolishing of Archbishops and bishops within the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales" has separate dated title page; register and pagination are continuous.
The two unnumbered pages after 193 contain a table of ordinances. Page 197 has heading "Die Jovis, 6 Septembr. 1649", and contains a letter from Thomas Noel and Stephen Estwick.
Reproductions of the originals in Havard University Library and Sion College Library, London.

"The severall ordinances and declarations of the Lords and Commons assembled in Parliament: for the abolishing of Archbishops and bishops within the kingdome of England, and dominion of Wales" appears separately at reel 1829:8 incorrectly identified as Wing E2293.
